sights.name: Strada Nuova Museums - Palazzo Rosso

sights.name: Piazza De Ferrari
sights.quote: City square known for its 1930s bronze fountain, home to several important cultural institutions.
sights.address: Piazza Raffaele de Ferrari, 16121 Genova GE, Italy

sights.name: Saint Stephen
sights.quote: Romanesque-style church dating to the 10th century, featuring a striped facade & a bell tower.
sights.address: Piazza Santo Stefano, 2, 16121 Genova GE, Italy
